programme.title: Running Wild
programme.desc: A retired Air Force Major (Gregory Harrison), now a UN observer for the International Wildlife Organization, and his children confront elephant poachers in Zimbabwe. Simon MacCorkindale, Cody Jones and Brooke Nevin costar.(n)

programme.title: Jasper Jones
programme.desc: Toni Collette, Hugo Weaving, Levi Miller, Angourie Rice, Dan Wyllie and Aaron McGrath star in the story of Charlie Bucktin, a bookish boy of 14 living in a small town in Western Australia. In the dead of night during the scorching summer of 1969, Charlie is startled when he is woken by local mixed-race outcast Jasper Jones outside his window. Jasper leads him deep into the forest and shows him something that will change his life forever, setting them both on a dangerous journey to solve a mystery that will consume the entire community.(n)

programme.title: Confessions of A Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: Lindsay Lohan stars as Lola, whose family moves from the center of everything in New York City to the center of a cultural wasteland in suburban New Jersey. She feels her life is simply not worth living, but no matter who or what gets in the way, Lola won't give up on her life's ambition to be a star.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeats
programme.desc: A feisty American hip hop dancer travels to India with her family for a wedding and falls in love - both with a new style of dance, and with the determined young man who introduces it to her.(n)

programme.title: The Preacher's Wife
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as an angel named Dudley sent to Earth to help a minister's marriage (Courtney B. Vance) to his wife (Whitney Houston). Things take a twist when Dudley accidentally falls in love with her.(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Hey Arnold! The Movie
programme.desc: Nickelodeon's popular hero with the football-shaped head gets his very own feature film with this animated family adventure that finds Arnold and his friends trying to stop a crooked developer from ruining their neighborhood, with the help of a superhero and a shadowy inside source. Featuring the voices of Paul Sorvino, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Christopher Lloyd.(n)

programme.title: Shanghai Noon
programme.desc: The Wild West meets the Far East in a battle for honor, royalty and gold when acrobatic Chinese Imperial Guard Chon Wang (Jackie Chan) comes to America to rescue beautiful Princess Pei Pei (Lucy Liu) who has been kidnapped from The Forbidden City. With the help of a partner he doesn't trust (Owen Wilson), a wife he didn't expect (Brandon Merrill), a horse with a personality all its own and martial arts moves no one can believe, Chon finds himself facing the meanest gunslingers in the West.(n)

programme.title: The Longshots
programme.desc: A former high school football star gets his self-respect back when he lands a job coaching the local Pop Warner team with his athletically gifted niece as quarterback. Ice Cube stars in this sports comedy with Keke Palmer and Dash Mihok.(n)

programme.title: Tron
programme.desc: When a brilliant video game maker named Flynn (Jeff Bridges) hacks the mainframe of his ex-employer, he is beamed inside a digital world and becomes part of the very game he is designing.(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Mistrust
programme.desc: Happy, beautiful and independent, Veronica enjoys being a mistress. No commitment, no strings and she never has to be vulnerable. She has carefully laid every brick in the walls of the fortress surrounding her heart. She's safe and having a great time. However, there is one person who knew her heart before those walls were erected, her best friend Brandon, who has stood by her for too many years to count. And while Veronica has tried to keep her feelings at bay, he is the one who holds the key that opens her Pandora's box of emotions.

programme.title: The Sense of an Ending
programme.desc: Tony Webster (Jim Broadbent) lives a reclusive existence in London, until he learns that a diary has been left to him by the recently deceased mother (Emily Mortimer) of an ex-girlfriend (Charlotte Rampling). As Webster investigates the diary, he is forced to face the truth about his first love and the consequences of decisions made a lifetime ago, while attempting to resolve his strained relationships with his ex-wife (Harriet Walter) and their pregnant daughter (Michelle Dockery).

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: As a way to pay off their mounting debts, lifelong pals Zack (Seth Rogen) and Miri (Elizabeth Banks) decide to write, direct and star in a pornographic movie, which they believe to be a sure moneymaker. But they may end up as the first couple in adult cinematic history that discovers long-hidden feelings for each other while doing so. Craig Robinson costars in this romantic sex comedy.

programme.title: Beyond the Opposite Sex
programme.desc: This documentary picks up the respective stories of Rene and Jamie, 13 years after their Gender Affirmation Surgeries. The two subjects let us back into their very changed worlds and find that their surgeries, which had been lifelong goals, were far from the finish line of their journeys - in fact, they turned out to be only the beginning of more difficult, arduous and true lifelong experiences.

programme.title: Pretty Persuasion
programme.desc: When high school student Kimberly Joyce accuses her English teacher of sexual harassment, she turns her exclusive Beverly Hills private school, and everything else in her wake, upside down. Hell hath no fury like a teenager scorned.

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home.

programme.title: Confessions of A Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: Lindsay Lohan stars as Lola, whose family moves from the center of everything in New York City to the center of a cultural wasteland in suburban New Jersey. She feels her life is simply not worth living, but no matter who or what gets in the way, Lola won't give up on her life's ambition to be a star.

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz.

Diagnosed with spinal cancer, 27 year old Adam (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) navigates the road to recovery with the sometimes-overbearing support of his crude best friend, Kyle (Seth Rogen), his smothering mother (Anjelica Huston) and an inexperienced therapist (Anna Kendrick). Inspired by a true story, 50/50 is an honest yet hysterically funny account of a young man's journey toward healing.

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.

programme.title: Confessions of A Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: Lindsay Lohan stars as Lola, whose family moves from the center of everything in New York City to the center of a cultural wasteland in suburban New Jersey. She feels her life is simply not worth living, but no matter who or what gets in the way, Lola won't give up on her life's ambition to be a star.

programme.title: Lucky Break
programme.desc: Peter Cattaneo ("The Full Monty") directs this British comedy starring James Nesbitt as Jimmy Hands, a raffish robber assigned to a grim correctional facility. When the prison's governor (Christopher Plummer) is persuaded to stage a production of a misguided musical based on the story of Admiral Nelson and Lady Emma Hamilton, Jimmy and his buddies seize the opportunity to plan a jailbreak. However, complicating matters is a lovely therapist (Olivia Williams), who, cast as Jimmy's costar, steals his heart. Timothy Spall and Lennie James costar.

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.

programme.title: Whale Rider
programme.desc: In a small coastal village, the Maori descend from Paikea, the Whale Rider. In every generation, a male heir has succeeded to the chiefly title. When twins are born, and the boy twin dies, the chief is unable to accept his grand-daughter, Pai, as a future leader. Koro, the chief, is convinced that the tribe's misfortunes began at Pai's birth and calls for people to bring their sons to him, sure a new leader will emerge. Pai loves Koro more than anyone in the world, but she must fight him and a thousand years of tradition to fulfill her destiny.

programme.title: Employee of the Month (2006)
programme.desc: A slacker box boy (Dane Cook) at a New Mexico superstore tries to impress a gorgeous new coworker (Jessica Simpson) by transforming himself into a model corporate drone, but runs up against the previous 17-time holder (Dax Shepard) of the store's "employee of the month" honor.

programme.title: Autumn In New York
programme.desc: A wealthy, charismatic New York restaurateur (Richard Gere) falls for a much younger hat designer (Winona Ryder) but their relationship is complicated by his philandering ways, his past connection to her family, and her debilitating illness. Jill Hennessey, Anthony LaPaglia, Sherry Stringfield and Elaine Stritch costar in this romantic melodrama.

programme.title: Dogville
programme.desc: Provocative and emotionally demanding, Lars von Trier's controversial allegory about the darker side of human nature and American arrogance has been likened to a hellish version of "Our Town." Into a small town - represented by chalk outlines and a few props - arrives a stranger (Nicole Kidman) in need of sanctuary. Initially welcoming, Dogville's citizens show their true colors once they listen to their paranoiac fears. This winner of more than 10 international awards costars Paul Bettany, James Caan, Patricia Clarkson and Lauren Bacall.

Diagnosed with spinal cancer, 27 year old Adam (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) navigates the road to recovery with the sometimes-overbearing support of his crude best friend, Kyle (Seth Rogen), his smothering mother (Anjelica Huston) and an inexperienced therapist (Anna Kendrick). Inspired by a true story, 50/50 is an honest yet hysterically funny account of a young man's journey toward healing.

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.

programme.title: Joan Rivers: A Piece of Work
programme.desc: This insightful, hysterically funny documentary follows comedienne Joan Rivers through a year of her life while looking back on her groundbreaking, barrier-breaking career as one of the first women to make a name for herself in the tough, male-dominated world of show business.

programme.title: Certain Women
programme.desc: Michelle Williams, Kristen Stewart and Laura Dern star as three women striving to forge their own paths amidst the wide-open plains of the American Northwest. The lawyer (Dern) finds herself contending with both office sexism and a hostage situation. The wife and mother (Williams) has determination to build her dream home which puts her at odds with the men in her life. The young law student (Stewart) forms an ambiguous bond with a lonely ranch hand (Lily Gladstone).

programme.title: Romy And Michele's High School Reunion
programme.desc: Romy (Mira Sorvino) and Michele (Lisa Kudrow) are carefree party girls who reinvent themselves for their 10-year high school reunion. With new wardrobes and wild stories of success, they make a big impression, until a former classmate (Janeane Garofalo) blabs their real story to everyone! But that's when Romy and Michele let loose with a surprise of their own to outrageous results.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: In 1953, a time when women's roles are rigidly defined, novice art history professor Katherine Watson begins teaching at the prestigious all-female Wellesley College, which despite its academic reputation, is an environment where success is measured by how well the students marry. Encouraging these women to strive for a more enlightened future, Watson challenges the administration and inspires her students to look beyond the image of what is, and consider the possibilities of what could be.

programme.title: Lucky Break
programme.desc: Peter Cattaneo ("The Full Monty") directs this British comedy starring James Nesbitt as Jimmy Hands, a raffish robber assigned to a grim correctional facility. When the prison's governor (Christopher Plummer) is persuaded to stage a production of a misguided musical based on the story of Admiral Nelson and Lady Emma Hamilton, Jimmy and his buddies seize the opportunity to plan a jailbreak. However, complicating matters is a lovely therapist (Olivia Williams), who, cast as Jimmy's costar, steals his heart. Timothy Spall and Lennie James costar.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms.

programme.title: Motherhood
programme.desc: A Manhattan mother of two finds herself in the midst of an epic, soul-crushing struggle when she sets out on a seemingly simple mission: arrange her two-year-old child's birthday party. Uma Thurman, Minnie Driver and Anthony Edwards star in this comedy about a "day from Hell.".

programme.title: TIFFANY HADDISH: SHE READY! From the Hood to Hollywood!
programme.desc: In this hour-long special filmed at the Nate Holden Performing Arts Center, rising comedy star Tiffany Haddish takes the stage in her hometown of Los Angeles to tackle subjects ranging from her early days in foster care and being bullied on the playground, to getting her revenge on ex-boyfriends and introducing Will and Jada Pinkett Smith to Groupon.(n)

With new wardrobes and wild stories of success, they make a big impression, until a former classmate (Janeane Garofalo) blabs their real story to everyone! But that's when Romy and Michele let loose with a surprise of their own to outrageous results.(n)

programme.title: Before I Fall
programme.desc: Sam (Zoey Deutch) seems to have everything a teenage girl could want: popularity, a hot boyfriend, cool status, fun friends, loving family and seeming happiness. But beyond the superficial, Sam's life isn't so charmed. She is one of a clique of high school mean girls who make life hell for those who are different. When Sam is killed in a car accident, she is forced to relive her last day on Earth seven times in order to get things right. She attempts to make sense of what befell her and gain a better understanding of herself and others.(n)

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is Brian Flanagan, a young, confident and ambitious bartender who, with the help of a seasoned pro (Bryan Brown), becomes the toast of Manhattan's Upper East Side. But when he moves to Jamaica and meets an independent artist (Elisabeth Shue), their vivid romance brings a new perspective to the self-centered bartender's life.(n)

programme.title: Home Again
programme.desc: Reese Witherspoon stars as Alice Kinney who is recently separated from her husband. Alice decides to start over by moving back to her hometown of Los Angeles with her two young daughters. During a night out on her 40th birthday, Alice meets three aspiring filmmakers who happen to be in need of a place to live. Alice agrees to let the guys stay in her guest house temporarily, but the arrangement ends up unfolding in unexpected ways.(n)

programme.title: The Girl On The Train
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her recent divorce, spends her daily commute fantasizing about the seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes every day. One morning she sees something shocking happen there and becomes entangled in the mystery that unfolds. Emily Blunt, Lisa Kudrow, Justin Theroux and Allison Janney star.(n)

programme.title: Before I Fall
programme.desc: Sam (Zoey Deutch) seems to have everything a teenage girl could want: popularity, a hot boyfriend, cool status, fun friends, loving family and seeming happiness. But beyond the superficial, Sam's life isn't so charmed. She is one of a clique of high school mean girls who make life hell for those who are different. When Sam is killed in a car accident, she is forced to relive her last day on Earth seven times in order to get things right. She attempts to make sense of what befell her and gain a better understanding of herself and others.(n)

programme.title: The Weather Man
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this comedy-drama as a Chicago weather man whose personal life enters free-fall even as his career is potentially about to take off with a new job on a national television morning show. Michael Caine and Hope Davis costar in this film from director Gore Verbinski ("The Ring," "Pirates of the Caribbean").(n)

programme.title: Terms of Endearment
programme.desc: Hard-to-please Aurora (Shirley MacLaine) is looking for love, while her daughter (Debra Winger) has her own set of family problems. Also starring Jack Nicholson.(n)

Fellini's Oscar-winning portrait of a film director struggling with a creative crisis. After admitting he's stumped for ideas about the film he's shooting, he holes away at a spa and retreats into reveries about his childhood and personal fantasies, much to the frustration of his impatient film crew and the exasperated women in his life.

programme.title: A Special Day
programme.desc: The film is set during the late 1930s; the occasion is the first meeting between Mussolini and Hitler. Left alone in her tenement home when her fascist husband runs off to attend the historic event, Sophia Loren strikes up a friendship with her homosexual neighbor Mastroianni. As the day segues into night, they develop a very special relationship that will radically alter both of their outlooks on life.

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Apalled by 19th-century conditions in a textile mill, a political refugee visiting Turin, Italy, organizes workers to strike. Based on actual events.

programme.title: The Pizza Triangle
programme.desc: A three-way love affair develops between a construction worker, his fiancée and a pizzeria cook.

programme.title: A Place for Lovers
programme.desc: Marcello Mastroianni and Faye Dunaway in this drama about an Italian engineer involved with an American divorcée. Filmed in Northern Italy. Maggie: Caroline Mortimer. Griselda: Karin Engh. Directed by Vittorio de Sica.

programme.title: Spring Fever
programme.desc: Silent comedy-romance about a shipping clerk who joins a country club, woos an heiress and gets involved in a high-stakes golf match.

programme.title: Across to Singapore
programme.desc: Two seafaring brothers compete for the attentions of a neighbor's daughter.

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: W. Somerset Maugham's tale of Sadie Thompson, a South Seas floozy who falls prey to a hell-and-brimstone reformer wishing to save the soul of the "lost woman," while being romanced by a lovelorn U.S. soldier.

programme.title: The Last of Mrs. Cheyney
programme.desc: A pair of debonair jewel thieves prey on British aristocrats while attending a high-society party.

programme.title: Mannequin
programme.desc: The story of a young tenement woman and the men she marries: a fight manager and a tugboat-line operator.

programme.title: When Ladies Meet
programme.desc: A young man loves an author who is about to have an affair with her publisher, despite having met his wife, whom she has come to like and admire.

programme.title: Humoresque
programme.desc: A blue-collar violinist accepts the patronage of a wealthy woman in order to further his career.

programme.title: Torch Song
programme.desc: A jaded Broadway diva must overcome her deep cynicism and fear in order to obtain true love with the blinded soldier who truly adores her.

programme.title: Sudden Fear
programme.desc: A playwright (Joan Crawford) discovers her husband (Jack Palance) and his girlfriend (Gloria Grahame) are planning her death. Bruce Bennett, Virginia Huston, Touch (Michael) Connors. Expert suspense melodrama directed by David Miller.

programme.title: Harriet Craig
programme.desc: A successful man marries a woman without realizing that she is neurotic, manipulative and selfish, and who treasures his house and possessions above him.

programme.title: Goodbye, My Fancy
programme.desc: A Congresswoman, who was expelled from college for having an affair with a professor, returns to her alma mater to receive an honorary degree.

programme.title: Strait-Jacket
programme.desc: Ax murders occur during a reunion between a disturbed woman (Joan Crawford) and her daughter (Diane Baker). Bill: Leif Erickson. Raymond: Howard St. John. Michael: John Anthony Hayes. Emily: Rochelle Hudson. Robert Bloch script.

programme.title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
programme.desc: An embittered has-been child actor torments her disabled sister, while scheming to resurrect her own vaudeville career when she was known as the talented "Baby Jane.

programme.title: Treasure Island
programme.desc: The first sound version of Robert Louis Stevenson's oft-filmed classic tale of a young English lad, a one-legged pirate named Long John Silver and a quest for buried treasure. (cc).

programme.title: Dumb-Hounded
programme.desc: A police dog named Droopy pursues a wolf who escaped from prison.

programme.title: Sacred City of the Mayan Indians
programme.desc: Entry in the "Traveltalk" series visits a Guatemalan city where the Maya civilization once flourished. Narrated by James A. Fitzpatrick.

programme.title: The Fargo Kid
programme.desc: A cowboy mistaken for a notorious gunman takes advantage of the misunderstandingto intimidate criminals who've overrun a mining town. (cc).

programme.title: Popeye Pleased to Meet Cha!
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto, rivals for Olive Oyl's affection, call on her bearing gifts.

programme.title: Tarzan and the Trappers
programme.desc: When not busy rescuing his animal friends, Tarzan (Gordon Scott) attempts to prevent the looting of a lost city. Eve Brent, Ricki Sorenson, Lesley Bradley, Maurice Marsac. Charles Haas, Sandy Howard directed. (cc).

programme.title: Pony Express Days
programme.desc: After being deemed too heavy, a young Bill Cody (George Reeves) is turned down as a Pony Express rider, but when a deliveryman is gunned down, Cody takes a shot at running the route. David Bruce, Frank Wilcox. Directed by B. Reeves Eason.

programme.title: Double Indemnity
programme.desc: An insurance salesman is seduced by a conniving woman into a scheme to murder her husband and make it look like an accident in order to collect his impressive life insurance policy. (cc).

programme.title: Them!
programme.desc: Atomic-bomb testing spawns an army of giant mutant ants that march through the storm drains of Los Angeles. (cc).

programme.title: The Time Machine
programme.desc: In 1899, a young scientist completes the construction of his time-travel machine and thrusts himself into the 20th century, witnessing the wars that took place before launching himself ahead to a distant year where humankind is not at all like it was. (cc).

programme.title: Operation Crossbow
programme.desc: Secret agents of the Allied forces take on a mission to go behind enemy lines and covertly destroy a German missile base. (cc).

programme.title: The Black Swan
programme.desc: Swashbuckling adventure about a roguish buccaneer who contemplates a career change after his old partner takes a job as the governor of Jamaica. Although he considers joining forces with another infamous brigand, the pirate instead falls in love with the daughter of the former governor and promises to change his illegal ways to win her heart. However, when she is kidnapped, her lover must rely on his skilled swordsmanship and his fearlessness in order to rescue her. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Captain Blood
programme.desc: Swashbuckling saga about a 17th-century Irish doctor who's unjustly charged with treason and sent to Jamaica, where he's sold into slavery, but when pirates attack the island, he and fellow prisoners escape, commandeer a Spanish galleon and set sail on the high seas. This Best Picture nominee made Errol Flynn a star, and is one of nine films he made with director Michael Curtiz. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Locket
programme.desc: Complex psychological melodrama about a schizophrenic and the man she ruins. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Easy Rider
programme.desc: Set in the '60s, pothead hippie bikers trip from L.A. to New Orleans searching for the meaning of life. On the way, they find comfort in a commune and violence in the South. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The American Friend
programme.desc: Director Wim Wenders' fascinating suspense yarn about a dying man persuaded to commit murders. Bruno Ganz, Dennis Hopper, Lisa Kreuzer, Gerard Blain. Derwatt: Nicholas Ray. American: Samuel Fuller. Based on a Patricia Highsmith novel.(n)

programme.title: Mata Hari
programme.desc: Greta Garbo stars in this biopic about the infamous exotic dancer who mixed spying for Germany with romance during World War I. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Mrs. Parkington
programme.desc: A Nevada maid falls in love with and marries an ambitious mine owner, but when he moves them to a palatial estate in New York, they are spurned by Manhattan society. Greer Garson was nominated for Best Actress as the title character, while Agnes Moorehead received a nod as Best Supporting Actress. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Locket
programme.desc: Complex psychological melodrama about a schizophrenic and the man she ruins. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Karamazov
programme.desc: Director-writer Richard Brooks' version of Dostoevsky's 19th-century masterpiece. (cc).(n)

programme.title: My Fair Lady
programme.desc: This Best Picture, a musical reworking of George Bernard Shaw's "Pygmalion," is about a pompous, acid-tongued professor of linguistics (Best Actor Rex Harrison) who tries to refine an ill-mannered, uneducated guttersnipe and pass her off as a princess in six months. The film won a total of eight Oscars. (cc).(n)

programme.title: International Velvet
programme.desc: Sequel to "National Velvet," with Tatum O'Neal as a horse-loving teen who's groomed to represent Great Britain in the Olympics. Christopher Plummer, Nanette Newman, Anthony Hopkins. Scott: Jeffrey Byron. Beth: Sarah Bullen. Curtis: Dinsdale Landen. Directed by Bryan Forbes. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: A rookie CIA operative (Ryan Reynolds) goes on the run with a rogue former intelligence officer (Denzel Washington) after a South African safe house comes under attack by heavily armed mercenaries. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: A furloughed convict teams with a joint American-Chinese anticyber-theft task force to root out a hacker based in Southeast Asia. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After body parts turn up in dumpsters, an investigation leads to a suspect who has an assumed identity. Al Archer: Dennis Boutsikaris. Briscoe: Jerry Orbach. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Filling in for Green, Det. Nick Falco (Michael Imperioli) works with Fontana to solve a porn star's murder. MacLaren: Kevin Dunn: Helen DeVries: Randy Graff. Milligan: Paul Schulze. Norrell: Guy Boyd. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After a food-network TV executive is found strangled, a celebrity chef (Kamar de los Reyes), with whom she was having an affair, becomes a suspect. Dressler: Wendie Malick. Borgia: Annie Parisse. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Dianne Wiest takes over as the DA and a case develops in which McCoy feels that “the penalties are too severe.” Megan: Megan Follows. Peck: Nick Chinlund. Parnell: John Costelloe. Harris: Brian Delate. Judge Schepps: Judith Roberts. Eleanor: Patricia Dunnock. Lewin: Dianne Wiest. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After a woman's body is found in a subway station, a suspect is arrested, but the resulting case concerns the lack of medication supplied him while in prison. Hollis: Jack Gilpin. Gallant: Ray Anthony Thomas. Andrews: Victor Slezak. Judge Mizener: Lynn Cohen. Jordan: Daniel Cantor. Lewin: Dianne Wiest. Briscoe: Jerry Orbach. McCoy: Sam Waterston. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After a violinist's murder, a case evolves in which Lewin and the presiding judge (Ron McLarty) exchange threats. Arthur Gold: George Grizzard. Reger: Ronald Guttman. Mrs. Reger: Jan Maxwell. Stern: Ritchie Coster. Brannigan: Terry Serpico. Lewin: Dianne Wiest. Carmichael: Angie Harmon. McCoy: Sam Waterston. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Chris is attacked by a woman (Marisol Nichols) he dated in his own time, who then tries to steal the whitelighter's powers and bring him back to the future with her. Meanwhile, Paige tries to tell her sisters that she wants to move out of the mansion. Reggae singer Ziggy Marley performs. Richard: Balthazar Getty. Jason: Eric Dane. Chris: Drew Fuller. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Paige is transported back to 1967 where she meets Grams as a young woman, but neither of them know that a planned witch gathering is really a trap set by a demon. Meanwhile, in the present, a slimy demon torments the residents of Halliwell manor. Grams: Jennifer Rhodes. Chris: Drew Fuller. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Piper gives up on finding true love again, so her sisters cast a spell to conjure up the perfect guy for her; Chris tries to persuade Piper to bind Wyatt's powers in order to protect the child from future attacks. Meanwhile, a dark priest sets out to capture Wyatt and make him evil. Mr. Right: Eduardo Verastegui. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Sunshine

programme.title: The Best Man

programme.desc: A couple attempts to salvage their marriage by inviting three other couples to join them at an island resort. However, everyone is disturbed to discover that participation in therapy sessions is mandatory if they hope to remain at the idyllic paradise. (cc).

programme.title: Why Him?
programme.desc: An adoring dad is horrified to discover that his daughter's tech-billionaire boyfriend is a tattooed, party-hearty lout. Despite the latter's heart of gold, the father refuses to warm to him—especially when he learns about his engagement plans. (cc).

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A team of high-class thieves set out to avenge their mentor's death with the help of his daughter. The plan consists of them stealing a fortune in gold, having it pilfered from them and then trying to get it back. (cc).

programme.title: Stratton

programme.title: Courage Under Fire

programme.title: The Great Wall

programme.desc: Three teenagers are kidnapped and imprisoned by a man with multiple-personality disorder, and must plot their escape without ever knowing which of his 23 personas—young or old, male or female, benign or monstrous—they will confront on the way out. (cc).

programme.title: The Book of Eli
programme.desc: Eli roams a postapocalyptic world, protecting a sacred tome that offers guidance on how to rebuild humanity. The evil Carnegie goes to great lengths to acquire the powerful book, but Carnegie's adopted daughter, who wants to escape her dad's clutches, helps Eli. (cc).

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: An amnesiac CIA assassin tries to piece together his life as he is hunted for elimination by his superiors. (cc).

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: While visiting his white girlfriend's family, an African-American man discovers that their seemingly idyllic community is hiding a sinister conspiracy—one that involves the disappearance of several black people in the area. (cc).

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: An ex-CIA agent turns Paris upside down when his teenage daughter is abducted by members of a sex-trade gang. (cc).

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: A 12-year-old girl's mother is a gambling addict. (cc).

programme.title: Born on the Fourth of July
programme.desc: Oliver Stone's docudrama about paralyzed Vietnam vet Ron Kovic, who tries to reconcile memories of his idealistic youth with his post-war disillusionment. (cc).

programme.title: Corky Romano
programme.desc: A bumbling veterinarian joins the FBI so he can destroy evidence against his mob-boss father. (cc).

programme.title: Back to the Future Part III
programme.desc: A teen must leap the space-time continuum to 1885 in the DeLorean time machine in order to rescue its inventor, whose 70-year-old letter reveals that he has retired to the Old West to live out his days there. Upon arriving, the boy finds the scientist in love and in danger. (cc).

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: Mild-mannered married couple Phil and Claire steal a dinner reservation, which leads to a case of mistaken identity. Turns out the reservation was for a pair of thieves, and now a number of unsavory characters want them dead. If they can survive a wacky and life-threatening night, they may just rediscover the passion missing from their marriage. (cc).

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Biopic about World War II Army medic Desmond Doss, a conscientious objector who refused to take a life or even carry a weapon. Doss was eventually awarded the Medal of Honor for saving the lives of 75 soldiers on the battlefields of Okinawa. (cc).

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: A genetically mutated scientist's alter ego runs amok in this adaptation of the Marvel comic. (cc).

programme.title: Rush Hour 2
programme.desc: A wisecracking L.A. cop (Chris Tucker) visits his friend the inspector (Jackie Chan) in Hong Kong, and is drawn into a case involving a mob bigwig and a counterfeiting ring. Chan's stunts punch up this predictable crime yarn. A sequel to 1998's “Rush Hour.” Brett Ratner directed. (cc).

programme.title: Extreme Ops
programme.desc: Extreme-sports enthusiasts run afoul of a slippery terrorist and his henchmen while filming a commercial in the Austrian Alps. Slick action, absurd plot. Devon Sawa, Rufus Sewell, Bridgette Wilson-Sampras. (cc).

programme.title: The Broken
programme.desc: A woman is thrust into a world where everything is subtly unfamiliar in this thriller starring Lena Headey. Gina McVey is enjoying dinner with her family and her boyfriend Stefan when a mirror shatters without cause. The next day Gina sees a woman who looks like her own doppelganger. Curious, Gina sneaks into the woman's apartment and sees a photo of herself and her father. Later, Gina notices that Stefan is not the same and begins having horrific nightmares. (cc).

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: When he has a vision of his flight to Paris crashing, a teen traveling with his French club makes a scene and they are all kicked off the airline. The plane goes down and the survivors are grateful, but Death hunts them down. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Totem
programme.desc: A teen goes to extremes to shield her family from a supernatural menace. (cc).(n)

programme.title: My Little Eye
programme.desc: In this British thriller, five contestants on a reality show spend six months together in an isolated house. They begin to turn on each other after the arrival of a stranger and a gun loaded with five bullets. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Cop Car
programme.desc: Two rebellious young boys steal a police cruiser and go for a joyride. But when they find a dead body in the trunk, they realize they must evade the car's owner, a corrupt small-town sheriff who's desperate to reclaim his property. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: Forensics expert Alex Cross investigates the disappearance of a senator's daughter, a student at a prestigious private academy. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Dragon The Bruce Lee Story
programme.desc: Biopic of the legendary martial-arts master Bruce Lee. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon
programme.desc: In 1964 San Francisco, a pre-fame Bruce Lee challenges a Shaolin monk named Wong Jack Man to a fight behind closed doors. This drama depicts this real-life event, which helped cement Lee's reputation as one of the greatest martial artists of all time. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Fate of the Furious
programme.desc: In the eighth installment of the "Fast and the Furious" series, Dominic Toretto's crew are rocked to their core when they must face their most-dangerous adversary yet: Dom himself, who is now working with a shadowy cyber-terrorist known only as Cipher. As DSS agent Luke Hobbs and the rest of the team attempt to fight back, they find themselves in an alliance with their old enemy, assassin Deckard Shaw. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Losers
programme.desc: A team of mercenaries wage war on the CIA after they're double-crossed by rogue agent Max (Jason Patric) during a mission in the Bolivian jungle. But in order to get to Max, the team will need a little help from sexy operative Aisha (Zoe Saldana), who has her own reasons for joining the fight. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton stars as Davy Crockett and Dennis Quaid is Sam Houston in this somber re-creation of the famous 1836 siege in San Antonio. Historically accurate, but unexciting. Jason Patric, Patrick Wilson. Directed by John Lee Hancock (“The Rookie”). (cc).(n)

programme.title: Big Fish
programme.desc: A chronicle of the life of Edward Bloom, a garrulous Southerner whose tall tales have always alienated his no-nonsense son, Will. But with Edward near death, Will must come to terms with his father and his stories before it's too late. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the popular video-game series, a death-row convict relives his ancestor's memories as an assassin in 15th-century Spain. From this out-of-body experience, he gains the training he needs to battle a conspiracy in the present day. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: A single woman and a spy race to elude a federal agent and uncover the truth about a clandestine mission gone awry. Meanwhile, a CIA director attempts to discover why the unlikely duo have taken flight. Extended edition. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
programme.desc: A freewheeling womanizer is haunted by his many old flames while attending his younger brother's wedding in this romantic comedy. Having conquered almost the entire bridal party, libidinous celebrity photographer Connor Mead ponders bedding the bride's mother until the Ghosts of Girlfriends Past guide him on an eye-opening tour of his romantic past, present and future. Along the way, they attempt to discern whether Connor will ever be able to change his ways. (cc).

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: An alcoholic businessman holds a yard sale after being fired from his job and thrown out of the house along with his belongings by his fed-up wife. While living on his front lawn, he unexpectedly makes friends with a neighborhood kid and tries to reconnect with a girl he loved in high school. (cc).

programme.title: The American President
programme.desc: President Andrew Shepherd, an unabashedly liberal Democrat, is just gearing up for re-election when he meets an attractive and sharp environmental lobbyist named Sydney Wade and the pair fall in love. But complications ensue for the widowed Chief Executive, who finds his courtship drawing the ire of the press, the public and a rival senator. (cc).

programme.title: A Walk in the Clouds
programme.desc: A WWII GI poses as the husband of a pregnant, unwed student for the sake of her family. (cc).

programme.title: Fried Green Tomatoes
programme.desc: Kathy Bates and Jessica Tandy head a fine cast in this story of female friendships in the South. Contains footage not shown in theaters. Idgie: Mary Stuart Masterson. Ruth: Mary-Louise Parker. Sipsey: Cicely Tyson. George: Stan Shaw. Frank: Nick Searcy. Ed: Gailard Sartain. Grady: Gary Basaraba. Buddy: Chris O'Donnell. Directed by Jon Avnet from a screenplay by Fannie Flagg and Carol Sobieski. (cc).

programme.title: Hoffa
programme.desc: A biography of the Teamsters Union boss is told in flashbacks from his rise and fall as a labor reformer to his disappeared in 1975. (cc).

programme.title: Public Enemies
programme.desc: Director Michael Mann's historical crime drama follows the efforts of top FBI agent Melvin Purvis in capturing notorious bank robber John Dillinger. A folk hero to the American public, Dillinger was virtually unstoppable at the height of his criminal career. J. Edgar Hoover's FBI was just being formed, and in order to turn his fledgling agency into a national police force, Hoover recruits Purvis to catch the most-elusive criminal in the country. (cc).

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: Bloody revenge saga about a disgraced intelligence agent-turned-bodyguard who becomes a one-man army when the girl he's protecting is kidnapped. (cc).

programme.title: Kong Skull Island
programme.desc: A disillusioned soldier and a photojournalist join an expedition to Skull Island, an uncharted territory in the Pacific. There, the group get caught up in an ongoing war between a gigantic ape called King Kong and the area's indigenous predators. (cc).

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: A centuries-old war between vampires and werewolves, and a vampire-hunting human who becomes entangled in their conflict. (cc).

programme.title: Arachnophobia
programme.desc: A doctor in a small town discovers that a spate of recent deaths are due to lethal spiders that have spawned after being accidentally shipped there from South America. He fights the deadly creatures with the help of an outrageous exterminator. (cc).

programme.title: Seed of Chucky
programme.desc: Maniacal doll Chucky (voice of Brad Dourif) and his bride (voice of Jennifer Tilly) go on a killing spree in Hollywood after being resurrected by their gentle offspring. A wooden horror yarn with wit. Tilly also stars as herself; indie filmmaker John Waters appears as a paparazzo. The fifth film in the horror series. Don Mancini, who created the series, makes his directorial debut. (cc).

programme.title: The Wicker Man
programme.desc: A sheriff is contacted by his former fiancée, who claims that her daughter is missing. He travels to an island, where the girl was last seen, but finds that there is a sinister Wiccan community there blocking his investigation. (cc).

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: Two scientists race to avert a catastrophe when a series of climate-control satellites begin to malfunction. During their mission, they discover a conspiracy involving the satellites, which were designed to prevent natural disasters on Earth. (cc).

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Brendan Fraser is a raider of the lost sarcophagus in this high-tech, effects-filled remake of the 1932 Universal Pictures horror classic. Evelyn: Rachel Weisz. Jonathan: John Hannah. Imhotep: Arnold Vosloo. Directed by Stephen Sommers. (cc).

programme.title: The Outsiders
programme.desc: Members of rival local gangs, distinguished by the haves and the have-nots, get into a scuffle that results in death in 1960s Oklahoma. (cc).

programme.title: The Birth of a Nation
programme.desc: This historical drama recounts a real-life slave revolt that occurred in 1831 Virginia, led by a black preacher named Nat Turner. Turner is so appalled by the horrors he sees while sermonizing that he is moved to fight back. (cc).

programme.title: La La Land
programme.desc: Struggling actress Mia and aspiring jazz pianist Sebastian begin a whirlwind romance as they both pursue their dreams in Los Angeles. However, their blossoming relationship is challenged when their careers pull them in different directions. (cc).

programme.title: Pirate Radio
programme.desc: After the BBC bans rock and roll from Britain's official airwaves, a DJ (Bill Nighy) begins broadcasting from a boat sailing in international waters. He and a group of on-air personalities become very popular, but the government wants to shut them down. Directed by Richard Curtis. Philip Seymour Hoffman, Rhys Ifans, Kenneth Branagh. (cc).

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: An eccentric scientist builds a time machine, which accidentally transports a high-school student back to the 1950s, where the teen inadvertently interferes with the budding romance between his future parents. The boy must figure out how to set things right, or risk completely altering the future. (cc).

programme.title: A United Kingdom
programme.desc: In this romance based on a true story, the African man who would become the first president of Botswana falls in love with a white British woman, prompting international controversy. (cc).

programme.title: The Pelican Brief
programme.desc: A law student is forced to go on the run after she uncovers an assassination plot based on a trail of murdered judges, a revelation which puts her own life in jeopardy. (cc).

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: While traveling to California with her boyfriend, a pregnant teen is abandoned at an Oklahoma Wal-Mart. She decides to stay, and makes a temporary home in the store while pondering her future. (cc).

programme.title: W.
programme.desc: Josh Brolin gives a pitch-perfect performance as President George W. Bush in Oliver Stone's surprisingly restrained biopic tracing Bush's transformation from a privileged, partying frat boy to a born-again Christian and conservative politician. Elizabeth Banks, Ellen Burstyn, James Cromwell, Richard Dreyfuss. (cc).

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: Director Takashi Shimizu's routine remake of his creepy Japanese thriller "Ju-on" stars Sarah Michelle Gellar as an American nurse in Tokyo who encounters a supernatural spirit spreading a deadly curse. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Annabelle Creation
programme.desc: A group of orphaned girls are taken in by a doll maker and his wife, who are still grieving the death of their daughter. However, they are soon terrorized by a haunted doll that's lurking within the couple's house. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Lions for Lambs
programme.desc: Robert Redford directed and stars in this talky treatise on the U.S. war on terror, intercutting the stories of a liberal professor (Redford), a hawkish U.S. senator (Tom Cruise) and a skeptical journalist (Meryl Streep). Michael Pena, Andrew Garfield, Peter Berg, Kevin Dunn. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: A New York adman deals with the pain of losing a child by writing letters to Time, Death and Love. He is soon visited by representations of the three concepts, and they, along with his close friends, help him return to some semblance of a normal life. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Diary of Anne Frank
programme.desc: The tragic plight of two Jewish families hiding from the Nazis in an Amsterdam attic. Joseph Schildkraut, Millie Perkins, Ed Wynn, Shelley Winters (Best Supporting Actress Oscar winner), Lou Jacobi, Richard Beymer, Gusti Huber, Diane Baker. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Biopic about World War II Army medic Desmond Doss, a conscientious objector who refused to take a life or even carry a weapon. Doss was eventually awarded the Medal of Honor for saving the lives of 75 soldiers on the battlefields of Okinawa. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: A clan's estranged patriarch loses his home and learns that his ex-wife plans to remarry, so he pretends to be dying to win back his family. Although his ex lets him move back in, his three adult children don't react well to their father's return. (cc).(n)

programme.title: 500 Days of Summer
programme.desc: Greeting-card copywriter Tom falls head over heels for his coworker Summer in this romantic comedy. The film moves forward and backward through various incidents in Tom and Summer's 500-day love affair. (cc).(n)

programme.title: I Love You, Beth Cooper
programme.desc: A geeky high-school student (Paul Rust) dedicates his valedictory speech to Beth Cooper (Hayden Panettiere), the most-popular girl in school. He gets quite a shock when Beth makes a surprise visit to his house and shows him what a night with his dream date would be like. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Big Trouble
programme.desc: The lives of a kooky collection of Miami residents interconnect in this adaptation of humorist Dave Barry's novel. A high-school boy accidentally crosses paths with two hitmen hunting a crooked businessman. Chaos ensues as the boy, the hitmen, two confused cops, two petty robbers, and the Russian mob all get tangled up with one another. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
programme.desc: During the 1660s, a teenage maid (Scarlett Johansson) in the Netherlands becomes a model for painter Johannes Vermeer (Colin Firth). Absorbing and visually rich; the film nicely captures Vermeer's artistic process. Tom Wilkinson. The film scored three Oscar nominations, including Best Cinematography. Peter Webber's directorial debut. Based on the novel by Tracy Chevalier. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A dying New York real-estate tycoon undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man, but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Once upon a Time in Mexico
programme.desc: A corrupt CIA agent teams up with a guitar-playing gunslinger to stop a coup South of the Border. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs take an unexpected trip through a portal and land in the middle of New York City, and they must find their way home before their archnemesis Gargamel (Hank Azaria) tracks them down. Directed by Raja Gosnell. (cc).

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.

programme.title: Dzień dobry
programme.desc: Poranne pasmo muzyczne, w którym prezentowane są najlepsze teledyski artystów cieszących się dużą popularnością.

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.(n)

programme.title: Hity na czasie
programme.desc: Zestawienie najpopularniejszych utworów muzycznych i teledysków, które znajdują się na szczytach różnych list przebojów.(n)

programme.title: Jazdy Gwiazdy
programme.desc: Gospodarz programu Filip "Rudy" Rudanacja zaprasza do swojego garbusa znane i lubiane gwiazdy show-biznesu. Podczas wspólnej przejażdżki nie zawaha się zapytać swojego gościa o wszystko, na co ma ochotę i co chcieliby usłyszeć widzowie.(n)

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.(n)

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.

programme.title: Up

programme.desc: Rank the Prank - pranking Hollywood style! Today our pesky pranksters are Prank 360 (Zhara and Sara) and Gladiators (Hadrian and Luke) who team up with SFX specialists Marc Reichel and Andy Antoine and stunt performer Devon Slack to stage the biggest and best PUBLIC PRANKS on an unsuspecting public. Today teams invade an office building and for unsuspecting targets, it's going to be anything but another... day at the office! It's all hands on deck to rig the hidden cameras and special effects required to bring our Pranksters' ideas to life. But which team will impress our prank-loving panel of 'Ranksters' to win the chance to stage a mind blowing MEGA PRANK on a 'target' of their choice? It's a battle between the head-scratching 'Office Switcheroo' and the super-charged 'Trainwreck Hallway'! Ranksters ... the choice is yours. For the winning team, Marc, Andy and Devon have planned a MEGA PRANK packed with ninja power! The setting is a martial arts dojo, complete with flying rigs, flying crates and flying people! Will the targets flap their wings and take flight too? One thing's for sure, this MEGA PRANK is gonna be fly!
